### Code Review Checklist

**Ensure the following are done before submitting the PR:**

- [ ] Code is well-formatted and follows the projectâ€™s coding style
- [ ] Code comments have been updated for readability and clarity
- [ ] Unused code or comments have been removed
- [ ] Unit tests have been added for new functionality
- [ ] No console logs or debug code remain
- [ ] Code has been rebased or merged with the latest from the base branch
